attributes.action: Temporary Rationing to stop panic buying in all food retail shops
attributes.additional_details:
I am on a low wage income and the panic buying of foods and home supplies  by the general population has caused me and many other people to go without.

I think it is the governments duty to restore order within the retail sector by placing a temporary ban on stockpiling of all foods and home cleaning,toiletry's and essential supplies.

I propose a 6 to 12 month rationing legislation that penalizes with a large fine and prosecution,including a prison sentence. 
To protect keyworkers/vulnerable
attributes.background: I would like to protect the ability for emergency services,armed forces,pensioners and workers/people on a low income to buy basic food and home supplies.
